習主席「保護主義や単独主義に断固反対」…米けん制にも

05 Nov 2019, 04:31



５日、上海で演説する中国の習近平国家主席（ロイター）

　【上海＝小川直樹】中国政府主催の大型見本市「国際輸入博覧会」が５日、上海で開幕した。習近平（シージンピン）国家主席は開幕式で演説し、「保護主義や単独主義に断固反対し、絶えず貿易障壁を減らす」と強調した。米国との貿易協議が「第１段階の合意」に向けて大詰めを迎える中、市場開放を一段と進める姿勢を示すとともに、米国をけん制する内容となった。
　輸入博での習氏の演説は昨年に続き２年連続となる。習氏は演説で、中国の購買力を強調し、さらなる関税の引き下げやビジネス環境の改善に取り組むと約束した。一方で、米国との貿易摩擦を念頭に、「摩擦に対しては協力こそが正しい道で、互いに許し、互いに譲れば、解けない問題はない」と述べ、米国に歩み寄りを訴えた。
　輸入博は、中国政府が輸入をテーマにした大型見本市として２０１８年に初めて開催した。今年は約１８０の国・地域、国際機関から、約３９００の企業・団体が参加し、展示面積は、前年比６万平方メートル増の３６万平方メートルとなった。１０日までの会期中、来場者は５０万人を超えるとみられる。
text:
Xuan Xia "resolutely opposed protectionism and unilateralism" ... also in the US

05 Nov 2019, 04:31



5 days, of China to address in Shanghai Xi Jinping Jintao (Reuters)

[Shanghai = Naoki Ogawa] The large-scale trade fair “International Import Expo” hosted by the Chinese government opened in Shanghai on the 5th. Xi Jinping (Shijinpin) Jintao Speaking at the opening ceremony, "opposed resolutely to protectionism and unilateralism, constantly reduce the trade barriers," he stressed. As trade talks with the United States approached the “first-stage agreement”, they showed a stance to further open the market and squeeze the United States.
Mr. Xi's speech at the Import Expo will be the second consecutive year since last year. In his speech, Xi emphasized China's purchasing power and promised to further reduce tariffs and improve the business environment. On the other hand, with trade friction with the US in mind, he said, “Cooperation with friction is the right way.
Import Expo was held for the first time in 2018 as a large trade show on the theme of imports by the Chinese government. This year, about 3,900 companies and organizations from about 180 countries / regions and international organizations participated, and the exhibition area increased by 60,000 square meters from the previous year to 360,000 square meters. During the session up to the 10th, the number of visitors is expected to exceed 500,000.
